This movie provides an insight into the mind of this modern-day equivalent to Da Vinci, who despite being an illegal thrill-seeker, managed to pull off this remarkable feat of human dare-devilry.

2) "Passion" directed by Roland Emmer is a captivating drama about the life of a French artist named Jean-Baptiste Canevar (1685-1769). This movie provides an insight into the mind of this exceptional creative genius, who despite being faced with numerous daunting challenges and setbacks throughout his entire lifespan, managed to produce an impressive array of remarkable and awe-inspiring works of art, which continue to be celebrated and revered worldwide today.
